name: Whole New Ball Game
description:
You play as a ball rolling through a series of mazes. Using keys, portals and several other features to find a way to the finish.
Use the arrow keys to move.
An old game I made a few years back. The ironically named 'Whole New Ball Game' is so similar so many other games out there. But it was a learning experience for me and I'm glad people get to play it.
